Arizona Winter School 2012: Ramification and Geometry

The 2012 AWS was held from March 10-14, 2012, at the University of Arizona in Tucson, AZ.

  • Speakers:
    • Irene Bouw and Stefan Wewers: Group actions on curves and the lifting problem
    • Ted Chinburg and Matt Stover: Determining large groups and varieties from small subgroups and subvarieties
    • David Harbater and Julia Hartmann: Division algebras and patching
    • Yoichi Mieda and Takeshi Saito: Wild ramification of schemes and sheaves
  • Organizers: Bryden Cais and Rachel Pries (main program), with Matt Papanikolas, Fernando Rodriguez-Villegas, David Savitt, and Dinesh Thakur.
